metadata.keywords: Bibliography Theses on music Articles Book reviews Music reviews Music & psyche
metadata.author: clement

content2.p: This list of writings on music and related topics is divided into three sections: Articles and Conference Papers; Reviews; and Editorial Work. Information on other writings, and texts, will be found on my other site when that is completed.
2005. Aspects of the Night Sea Crossing: a thesis submitted in partial fulfilment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy. 98p. Birmingham Conservatoire
2003 (ed.) Mechanisms and Shadows: three composers muse on life and Western art music. Music & Psyche Journal, 2. Feb.’03 (42-56)
2001. Musicmaking and Healing the Breach. Music & Psyche Journal, 1. Nov. ’01 (27-40).
2001. A Dynamic Model of Human Personality Attributes: applications to composers’ procedures and other musical activity. Paper presented at the Birmingham Conservatoire Research Study Day, 26th May.
2000. Music at the Bauhaus. Tempo No. 213, July 2000 (5-11)
1998. Tuning, Resonance & Consciousness. Paper presented at Birmingham Conservatoire Study Day, 23rd May.
1997. Masculine and feminine in musical experience in the context of a post-Jungian model. Paper presented at Music & the Psyché III Conference, Stourhead Trust, Dorset, 4th-6th April
2005. Elson, Shulamit 2004. Kabbalah of Prayer: sacred sounds and the soul’s journey. Lindisfarne — Music & Psyche Journal, 4. Aug.’05.
2005. Elson, Shulamit 2005. Beyond Words: sacred sounds of the Tree of Life. CD. Soul-Songs Publ. — Music & Psyche Journal, 4. Aug.’05
2005. Beament, James 2003 reprint. How We Hear Music: the relationship between music and the hearing mechanism. Boydell — Music & Psyche Journal, 4. Aug.’05.
2005. McIntosh, Solveig 2005. Hidden Faces of Ancient Indian Song. Ashgate — Music & Psyche Journal, 4. Aug.’05
2004. Poppleton, Colin. 2003-4. The Drumharp Collection. 10 CDs. Drumharp Collection — Music & Psyche Journal, 3. Jan.’04 (67-68) with Susan Nares
2003. Devereux, Paul 2001. Stone Age Soundtracks: acoustic archæology of ancient sites. Vega — Music & Psyche Journal, 2. Feb.’03 (70-71)
2003. Wilson, Glenn D. 2002. Psychology for Performing Artists, 2nd ed. Whurr — Music & Psyche Journal, 2. Feb.’03 (72-73)
2003. Harvey, Jonathan 1999. In Quest of Spirit: thoughts on music. University of California Press — Music & Psyche Journal, 2. Feb.’03 (73-76)
2003. Long, Linda et al. 2003. Music of the Plants & Music of the Body. 2 CDs. Molecularmusic — Music & Psyche Journal, 2. Feb.’03 (82-84)
2002. Edward Rushton’s ‘Palaces’—Tempo, 220, April ’02 (38-9)
2002. Julian Anderson’s ‘Imagin’d Corners’—Tempo, 221, July ’02 (44-5)

2005. Editor of the Music & Psyche Journal, Issue 4. [This was the last issue owing to funding problems - I have some dozens of copies remaining, which are available for postage stamps = £1.00 to cover p&p.]
2001- . Associate Editor of the Music & Psyche Journal, responsible for Reviews and the Resources lists: Books, Recordings & Websites.
A very long time ago, editor of college magazine.
An even longer time ago, co-editor of school magazine, and supplier of cartoons.
